name: Kinetics Project
short_description: Athlete trainer for Cyclists, Runners, Hikers, Climbers, Skiers, and general outdoor enthusiasts.  The Kinetics Project allows collection of data from GPS [Garmin], inertial sensors, and physiological data sensors such as heart rate [Polar] monitors.
